Cocona

Introduction

Akiyama Cocona is a Japanese rapper, singer-songwriter, and dancer under XGALX. She is best known as the main rapper and maknae of the Japanese global girl group XG.

Born and raised in Kanto, Japan, Cocona had been exposed to dancing, singing, and rapping since she was little. And the XG project felt like her destiny so she decided to join. In 2018, Cocona won the Kira Challe audition for her singing.

On January 31, Cocona was revealed as the third member of XG. The group officially debuted on Mar 18, 2022, with their debut digital single "Tippy Toes" on January 31, 2022.

2
Cocona has been friends with Maya since her childhood.
…
3
Cocona meditates and writes notes daily. She often reflects on what kind of artist she wants to be and what kind of influence she wants to have on others with music.
…
4
Cocona's lucky color is yellow-green. She says when she wears this color something good will happen.
…
5
Cocona's parents wanted her to be a musician since she was born.
…
6

…

Cocona chose Kehlani as her dream artist to collaborate with because since she was a trainee she loved everything about her.
…

…
